entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix AbstractCreateServicesOnTextViewConnection to not create VisualStudioWorkspace #78355
  • How to fix CS9236? #78347
  • extension syntax bug #78346

Closed

  • IL baselines in the compiler should use metadata display #78240
  • API for generating the virtual project behind file-based programs #78159
    Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not offer use-expr-body for properties with initializers #78360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #78358
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delete copy of System.IO.Hashing sources #78357
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix syntax tree creation when modifying source generated documents #78343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Make IDiagnosticAnalyzerService into an IWorkspaceService #78359
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add BuildHost APIs for loading an in-memory project #78303
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add dump reporting for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/76225 #78354
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow Razor logs to be directed to the right output window in VS Code #78334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unnecessary dependency in LSP handlers #78356
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify Impl interface tests #78351
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Clean up ReferenceEqualityComparer polyfill #78350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not use nint / nuint in IL baselines #78246
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cleanup IDE space around instance operators #78349
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reenable source indexing #78352
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Implement SeparatedSyntaxList.Count(Func<T, bool>) #78348
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow batch updating of ProjectUpdateState's RemovedMetadataReferences and AddedMetadataReferences members #78342
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Refactor/cleanup usages of MakeCallWithNoExplicitArgument helper #78273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge branch 'UserDefinedCompoundAssignment' into 'extensions' #78302
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • For IsAtDotDotToken, ensure the current token is a DotToken before parsing the next token to see if it's also a DotToken. #78338
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: honor OverloadResolutionPriority attribute #78219
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Insert missing space in XML documentation #78361
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move remaining legacy workspace event listeners over to new APIs. #78333
    VSCode
  • Extract base LanguageServerProjectLoader from LanguageServerProjectSystem #78329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • On-the-fly-docs -- Add better testing and provide more context for more cases #78148
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use ActivationConstraint.FeatureFlag API to control when Semantic Search is enabled #77133
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cleanup the code we have to run copilot code in parallel #78324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Filter out CompilerFeatureRequired and Obsolete attribute from method symbols #78313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Required Members
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Edit & Continue support for field access in auto-properties #78289
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix async hoisted type substituted local #78231
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • *** WIP: Optimize work done in ProjectCodeModelFactory #78337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
